onChange.script:
#Script to determine if we can proceed to the next page of registration
	fields = currentValue.value
	proceed = True
	needed = ''
	for field in fields:
		if fields[field].value == False: 
			proceed = False
			if needed == '':
				needed = field
	self.params.proceed = proceed
	self.params.neededToProceed = needed

props.text: The services your congregation will offer this season
Typical maximum we will send you, unless prior arrangements have been made.

config.script:
#	if self.props.params.currentSelection == self.view.custom.CursorStartAt:
#		self.view.custom.CursorMoved = False
#		self.props.params.message = ''
#	else:
#		currentSelection = self.view.params.capacityFromDB
#		if currentSelection == 0:
#			if self.props.params.benchmarkValue < 7:
#				currentSelection = 8
#			elif (self.props.params.benchmarkValue>=8) and (self.props.params.benchmarkValue < 12):
#				currentSelection = 12
#			else:
#				currentSelection = self.props.params.benchmarkValue
#		else:
#			currentSelection = currentSelection
#		self.props.params.message = "Will you please consider "+ str(currentSelection) +" Guests this season? What will you need from Room In The Inn to make this possible?"
	system.perspective.print(self.props.params.benchmarkValue)
	lastSeason = self.props.params.benchmarkValue
	selectedValue = self.props.params.currentSelection
#	selectedValue = self.view.custom.CursorStartAt
	if self.props.params.benchmarkValue < 7:
		currentSelection = 8
	elif (self.props.params.benchmarkValue>=8) and (self.props.params.benchmarkValue < 12):
		currentSelection = 12
	else:
		currentSelection = lastSeason
	system.perspective.print(self.props.params.benchmarkValue)
	if selectedValue < currentSelection:
		system.perspective.print("Will you please consider "+ str(currentSelection) +" Guests this season? What will you need from Room In The Inn to make this possible?")
		self.props.params.message = "Will you please consider "+ str(currentSelection) +" Guests this season? What will you need from Room In The Inn to make this possible?"
	else:
		system.perspective.print("Will you please consider "+ str(currentSelection) +" Guests this season? What will you need from Room In The Inn to make this possible?")
		self.props.params.message = ""

transforms.code:
capacity = value
	capacityLastSeason = self.props.params.benchmarkValue
	if capacity == 0:
		if capacityLastSeason < 8:
			self.view.params.capacity = 8
			return 8
		elif capacityLastSeason >=8 and capacityLastSeason < 12:
			self.view.params.capacity = 12
			return 12
		else:
			self.view.params.capacity = capacityLastSeason
			return capacityLastSeason
	else:
#		if capacityLastSeason < 8:
#			return 8
#		elif capacityLastSeason >=8 and capacityLastSeason < 12:
#			return 12
#		else:
#			return capacityLastSeason
		return capacity

props.text: Your congregation can host extra night on short notice during extreme weather.
Are guests required to use stairs?
Please list any other organization that work with your group to host Room in the Inn. This could include other congregations, scout troops, student groups or service organizations.
